MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Chiniguchi River Project in North America dated March 2009

document.title: Independent Technical (Geological) Report - Chiniguchi River Property
document.description: This report is designed to comply with National Instrument 43-101 standards of Disclosure for Mineral Projects and was prepared using Form 43-101F1 and guidelines in Companion Policy 43-101CP.
